name: Living Iron Statue
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two attacks: one with its blade and one with its hammer.

action.name: Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Whirl {@recharge 5}
entries: The statue can use its action to spin at the waist, targeting creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 19 ({@damage 3d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
